document_data.caption: A [[druid]] inflicting an opponent with an ''infestation of maggots''.
document_data.name: Infestation of maggots
document_data.mainbody: '''''Infestation of maggots''''' was a [[necromancy]] [[spell]] used by [[druid]]s in the [[realms]].
document_data.Effects: By touching an opponent, a druid casting this spell would cause an infestation of maggot-like creatures to cover the target creature. These maggots would slowly drain one's constitution unless resisted or removed by a ''[[remove disease]]'' or ''[[heal]]'' spell. Otherwise, they would naturally die off once the duration of the spell ended.
document_data.Components: Unlike most druidic spells, this spell required a handful of dessicated flies as a [[material component]], in addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
